name: The Perfect Birthday Cake
description:
The Perfect Birthday Cake  by Erica & Tracy Chiem

Description

Erin finds the perfect birthday cake recipe and wants to make a cake for her sister's birthday. However, she is still missing a few items and she asks for your help to find them!

The Perfect Birthday Cake features elements of a narrative visual novel game as well as a point-and-click adventure game.

***

Background Information

The Perfect Birthday Cake (TPBC) is a game made as a surprise birthday present created by me (Erica) and my little sister (Tracy)  for our sister's birthday (Jessica's birthday).  

TPBC is a narrative game with point-and-click elements. The game was made to include a bunch of things that she likes - durian cake, sudoku puzzles, crab plushies, Bob's Burgers, and much more! 

The original version of TPBC features game music made up of songs from her playlist and favourite shows. There is also a secret ending where she is able to go back into the game, navigate to the phone booth, and listen to audio recordings of her friends wishing her a happy birthday!

This version of the game uses different music and is published without the secret ending!

***

[Note: You may need to click panels twice for them to pop-up !]
